meta.title: PacNEM - PacMan meets NEM
meta.description: Earn cryptocurrency Tokens as a Player or as a Sponsor! PacNEM is an open source Multiplayer PacMan game using the NEM Blockchain featuring Instant Pay per View, Multiplayer Challenges and Achievements, Rewards Payouts and an Innovative way of using the NEM public ledger to Store Game Credits informations!
meta.keywords: pacman, pacnem, multiplayer pacman, multiplayer game, blockchain, nem, nemblockchain, pacman nem, mosaics, namespaces, multi signature, multisig, sponsored play, pay per play, pay-per-play, crypto currencies, cryptocurrency, game advertisement, game sponsor, blockchain gaming, ad views, instant payments

guest.title_blue_box: NEM #blockchain meets Pacman (Read the Blog article about this Project)
guest.welcome_paragraph_1_1: Welcome to the Pacnem Game. This game is a Free & Open Source Node.js Autonomous Game using the nem Blockchain.
guest.welcome_paragraph_1_2: This project uses the nem Blockchain to authenticate Players as well as for Managing Game Sponsors and Mosaics Payouts which are done with Multi Signature Accounts. The game will also store Game Credits and High Scores on the blockchain. This game will reflect how easy it is to use nem in your applications or games business layers and will emphasize the easy Setup for sponsoring and advertising Software in the Gaming industry using the nem Blockchain as well as Instant Payments.
guest.play_mode_explain: PacNEM can be played in Sponsored Play or Pay per Play modes. In sponsored play mode you won't need to pay anything, you only need to watch the Sponsor Advertisement and will then be able to Play with one of our Sponsored Accounts! The Pay per Play mode lets you Buy evias.pacnem:heart Game Credits directly to your XEM Wallet. These different game modes were introduced to show the easiness of integration of the nem Blockchain in the Gaming Industry.
guest.enter_data_to_join: Please enter a username and XEM address below. Hit the 'Enter' button to join the Pacnem experience.
guest.security_paragraph_1: Pacnem will never ask you to enter Sensitive information like your Wallet Password or your Wallet Private Key.

sponsor_engine.explain_sponsor_engine: If you wish to become a PacNEM Sponsor, please fill the form below with your Contact Details and our Team will come back to you. As a Sponsor, you will receive instant Mosaic Payouts whenever your Advertizement is being watched by Players using the Sponsored Play PacNEM Game Mode.The PacNEM Sponsor Engine lets Gaming Industry Sponsors Earn Money through Advertizing. Publishing Content on the PacNEM Sponsor Engine will go through a Compliance Process.
sponsor_engine.type_both: Advertizing with both Images and Videos
sponsor_engine.fill_form_to_be_sponsor: Fill out this form and Register to be PacNEM Sponsor
sponsor_engine.error_missing_mandatory_field: Invalid Input. Please check and try again.
sponsor_engine.legend_asterisk: Obligatory field. Input cannot be empty or invalid for those fields.
sponsor_engine.error_email_unique: This E-Mail address is already in use as a Sponsor on PacNEM.
sponsor_engine.registered_success: Thank you! We have successfully saved your application to be a PacNEM Sponsor. We will come back to you as soon as possible.

forms.error_format_address: Invalid XEM address, please verify your input.
forms.error_network_address: XEM address cannot be used on this blockchain
forms.description_placeholder: My business runs advertizement in the Gaming Industry by publishing Videos every week, I would like these to be displayed

player.select_room_message: Thank you, Now please select a Room to Join in the list.

donations.title: Share - Links - Donations
donations.description: This game was developed with Node.js, Socket.io, Handlebars and nem and started as a fork of this project. This project aims to use nem in as many ways as possible in order for me to collect experience in the blockchain application development industry.
donations.explain: If you like the initiative, and for the sake of good mood, I recommend you take a few minutes to Donate a beer or Three [because belgians like that] by sending some XEM (or whatever Mosaic you think pays me a few beers someday!) to my XEM Wallet

links.intro: Following is a list of Links / References useful during Development of this project

scores.title: Pacnem High Scores
scores.explain: Welcome to the Pacnem High Scores. The following list is held up to date via the nem blockchain.
scores.empty_high_scores: Currently, no PacNEM high scores have been saved to the blockchain yet.

sponsors.example_description: Ut wisi enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit lobortis nisl ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis autem vel eum iriure dolor in hendrerit in vulputate velit esse molestie consequat, vel illum dolore eu feugiat nulla facilisis at vero eros et accumsan et iusto odio dignissim qui blandit praesent luptatum zzril delenit augue duis dolore te feugait nulla facilisi.

invoices.placeholder_recipient: PacNEM XEM Address will appear here
invoices.buy_hearts_explain: Howdy dear nember! You selected the Pay per Play mode and will now need to buy Game Credits. Game Credits for the PacNEM game are published to the NEM blockchain in the form of evias.pacnem:heart Mosaics. 1 of our Hearts mosaic is the equivalent of 1 Multiplayer Pacman Game Session.
invoices.buy_hearts_warning_game_autonomous: This game runs autonomously, Please understand that we cannot reimburse or transfer back XEMs you might have sent to PacNEM without a Message.
invoices.buy_hearts_warning_message: Please, Do not forget to add the Message below in your Transaction to PacNEM!
invoices.flow_after_paid_explain: PacNEM will process your Payment automatically. When we have received your Payment we will send you the listed Mosaics using the NEM Blockchain. A Listing of Transactions matched to Invoices can be found under your Purchases History.

invoice_history.title: Your Pacnem Purchases History
invoice_history.explain: On this page you will find a History of your Purchases with the Pacnem Game.
invoice_history.empty_invoice_history: You didn't make a purchase yet.

summary.congratulations: Congratulations! You have Won this Game Session. You can win Mosaics by Playing PacNEM! Win 5 Multiplayer Game Sessions in a day to win an exclusive Mosaic!
summary.maybe_next_time: You have lost this Game Session! Feel free to try again anytime soon! If you don't have any Credits anymore, you can Train in Sponsored Play mode!
summary.winner_yoda_quote_1: A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.
summary.winner_yoda_quote_2: Already know you that which you need.
summary.winner_yoda_quote_3: Always two there are, no more, no less. A master and an apprentice.
summary.winner_yoda_quote_4: Always pass on what you have learned.
summary.winner_yoda_quote_5: Mind what you have learned. Save you it can.
summary.loser_yoda_quote_1: Strong is Vader. Mind what you have learned. Save you it can.
summary.loser_yoda_quote_2: You must unlearn what you have learned.
summary.loser_yoda_quote_3: You will be. You... will... be.
summary.loser_yoda_quote_4: Fought well you have, my old Padawan
summary.loser_yoda_quote_5: Much to learn, you still have.

lounge.empty_mosaics_list: Today PacNEM has not sent any Mosaics Transfers yet..

security.title_session_expire: Your session is about to expire
security.explain_session_expire: The PacNEM Sponsor Engine allows you to stay online only for a limited amount of Time.
security.explain_session_expire_redirect: You will now be redirected back to the PacNEM Welcome Screen. You can also select Sponsored Play Mode again.
security.explain_player_authenticate: Welcome back! The first time you have Paid for Credits on PacNEM, we have sent you a Transaction in your XEM Wallet containing a Personal Token. Please use this Personal Token (the Message in the said Transaction) whenever you come back to PacNEM!
security.explain_player_authenticate_first: If this is the first time you paid for PacNEM credits, please check your Wallet as you should have received a Transaction containing a pacnem:personal-token Mosaic along with a Message (which is your Personal Token).
security.info_player_authenticate: If you don't remember your Personal Token anymore, check your Wallet and look for the Transaction containing a pacnem:personal-token Mosaic. The message of this transaction is your Personal Token.
security.check_account_address: Please check following Account for Incoming Transactions with a Mosaic pacnem:personal-token:
security.explain_session_blocked: Dear NEMber, we have observed too many Invalid Login Attempts and you have been blocked for 1 Hour.
security.explain_session_blocked_redirect: You will now be redirected back to the PacNEM Welcome Screen. You can still play in Sponsored Play Mode.
